name: Dogwood Alliance
goal: Our Mission: Dogwood Alliance mobilizes diverse voices to protect Southern forests and communities from destructive industrial logging through community and grassroots action, holding corporate and government decision-makers accountable, catalyzing large-scale conservation, and advancing a twenty-first century society that values forests for the many ways they sustain life.
euInitiatives: EU Initiatives related to climate changes, renewables subsidies, biomass policies, etc.
